Package com.example.projectv2.Controller

Class AvailableEventsAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<AvailableEventsAdapter.ViewHolder>
com.example.projectv2.Controller.AvailableEventsAdapter
public class AvailableEventsAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<AvailableEventsAdapter.ViewHolder>
Adapter class for displaying a list of available events in a RecyclerView on the home screen. Handles loading event data, including images, and navigating to the appropriate event detail page based on the user's role.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    AvailableEventsAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder class that holds the views for displaying an event's details in the RecyclerView.

    • onBindViewHolder

      public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull AvailableEventsAdapter.ViewHolder holder, int position)
      Binds the data of an event to the corresponding views in the ViewHolder. Also handles loading the event's image and setting up a click listener for navigation.
      Specified by:
